work.name: Research Assistant
work.summary: Developed process for optimal gas-nitriding & PVD sputtering to create AlN coating on aluminum alloys. Optimized experimental parameters and the experimental setup for required coating quality. Carried out XRD, EDS, SEM, and Hardness testing of samples to ascertain process feasibility.

work.name: Research Assistant
work.summary: Ascertained electronic and structural effects of NiO doping in Alkaline Niobates for use in new generation capacitors. Prepared bulk ceramic samples via powder synthesis and sol-gel methods, including heat treatments. Conducted dielectric spectroscopy, XRD, TGA, Raman spectroscopy, and FESEM to characterize the doped ceramics.
highlights: Published results in Jour. of Appl. Physics & 3 conferences, won Best poster award (Research Conclave, IITG, 2017)

projects.name: ASM (American Society for Metals) Materials Camps
projects.summary: I lead electron microscopy module at the yearly ASM camp to encourage high school students to take up STEM fields. I demonstrate Electron microscopy and other topics in materials science and engineering.

projects.name: Improving Solid State Synthesis Yield
projects.summary: I led Vanadium Oxide preparation project in a group of four, tailored heat treatment strategies, and improved synthesis yield from 20% to over 80%. We reduced the study time from a semester to just three weeks by careful resource management and actively inducing data feedback.

projects.name: Thin-film Characterization
projects.summary: I carried out literature survey on XRD, Raman Spectroscopy, and surface profilometry to identify given thin-films.

projects.name: Student Satellite Project
projects.summary: I delegated survey tasks to 8 interns at the Dept of Electronics, IIT Guwahati and identified essential elements for building microsatellites. I also held pertinent presentations (online) for 5 regional colleges, instructing nearly 300 students and teachers.
